title: Field hockey at the 1970 Asian Games
content:
Field hockey was contested for men only at the 1970 Asian Games in Bangkok, Thailand. The champions were decided in the final minutes of the 10-day event as Pakistan scored a solitary goal in extra time for a 1â€“0 win against India.  

* South Korea and Indonesia withdrew, Ceylon moved to Group A to balance the number of teams in each group.
concepts: Field hockey at the 1970 Asian Games
